storyInfo: In order to reclaim the city from Nian, Rhodes Island and Lungmen join forces to make a desperate move. Just when the battle is about to reach its climax... the director decides to interrupt everything.

attributes.content: Act Three
Visit
Use your spear to strike your shield.
Use your shield to block your spear.
So the question is what happens when your right hand fights your left?
Apparently nothing.
Even if you win, what then?
What then indeed.
Hmmm.... But actually, wouldn't your dominant hand have an advantage?
4:21 A.M. \ Cloudy
Lungmen Outskirts
Three days since the L.G.D. lost control of District 21
Here you are, Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can look out over the fallen city from here.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Chief Wei's decision to move the satellite cities and form a defensive line to cut off the Nian's attack was decisive.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I never thought that one day I'd be staring down a piece of Lungmen like this.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...It's ridiculous.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: That's where the Nian is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's a mall over there in that district I liked to go to.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: And some of my friends live there.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, Officer Ch'en
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's unfathomable that an entire city-state could be at a disadvantage against just one enemy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: With how long it takes to train a professional soldier versus how long it takes her to cast a warrior, it goes without saying.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Lava, Rhodes Island elite operator, master caster, and Catastrophe expert.
Her Arts transcend the shackles of space.
Lava! You're here!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, I shouldn't have engaged her like that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Tell that to the operators we lost. The price to extract you was high.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What we need is your knowledge and skill. We don't need you killing morale with apologies.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Morale? Relying on morale in the face of an unknowable enemy will lead only to death and misery.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: To defeat her and take back the city, you must confront the mystery that has plagued us throughout history.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: 'Her weakness.'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I thought that was your mission.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The good news is that the 'Nian' is eager to communicate with us.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The bad news is that her personality is terrible.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I had high expectations of you, so you better not tell me you're empty-handed.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I've managed to glean a few leads from the extensive historiography, but following up on them means more bloodshed.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You don't have to go it alone. The Nian has a nasty temperament. If anything were to happen to you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My blood alone is enough.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ch'en Sir, emergency communication.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We've got a bead on the Nian. She's approaching the front line.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Tell the teams not to engage. And warn the civilians not to get involved. This isn't a game.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: But she didn't bring many troops with her....
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: To her, numbers mean nothing. We can only slow her down.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You said she has a weakness. Out with it already. We're short on time.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Her weakness is firecrackers.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Firecrackers?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: No record of the 'Nian' has ever described her face, let alone her weaknesses. But a trip to Yan led me to some new discoveries.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Any culture with a long history will have its legends and folklore. Although some of it may have origins in more recent times, obscuring the truth.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Some theories suggest that firecrackers were the forerunner of modern Originium explosives technology, originating in some devotional folk practices.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That's a pretty common custom. You throw out the firecrackers to scare off the evil spirits and wish for a peaceful new year.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And what are the evil spirits in these ancient legends?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Wait, the L.G.D. can bring out 100,000 times the explosive power of a firecracker. This doesn't make any sense.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: 'Fear the noise, fear the flame.'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If the Nian's function really is 'smelting', then a firecracker doesn't pose a threat to her at all.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She... called herself a craftsman. Flame and noise are part of her work, or at least part of some kind of image she projects.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Some kind of image?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's a theory I have to explain her utterly irrational ability to do these things without the use of Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: So she's afraid of herself? You keep making less and less sense...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I thought it was just a legend.... But it's worth a try.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She did flinch when I used some big, noisy flame Arts.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...It could work. It's not like we have the time to apply rigorous academic peer review anyway.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: We have to try something, at least. She's already breathing down our necks.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Let me say one last thing.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She's strong. There may be a way to destroy her, but the price will be high.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ——The L.G.D. will make sure it isn't *too* high.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Try to avoid taking her head on. She doesn't like to kill, at least.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Second, using her power doesn't wear her out. If we get into a war of attrition with her, we're the ones who go down.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Third, for some reason, she has an interest in modern consumer goods.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...How does this help us fight her?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The hunter traps the beast by taking advantage of its nature. And what we call 'personality' is just nature in a fancy package.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Finally, beware her sword and shield. They are of utterly incomprehensible construction.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Sword and shield, got it.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I'll be the one striking at her weak point. I hope Amiya and the L.G.D. can create some space for me to do that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She'll pay for using those Reunion illusions to toy with our Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: But command of the L.G.D....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Chief Wei and the Doctor have it under control.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Then I'll go with you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's okay, I can take care of myself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: With Rhodes Island and the L.G.D. fighting the good fight, it's time for me to do what I can...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's slowing the Nian's advance. No problem!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, let's go.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These are some pretty high walls.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hey you, the soldiers up there, can you hear me...?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Are they ignoring me? Is that any way to treat a lady?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hmmm.... It's got a smooth surface. I'll give it a knock.... Some kind of alloy, right? Seems stronger than the brick and mortar ones?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I wonder if it'll leave a dent in my sword. I'd hate to ruin it...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Whatever. I already took it out of the sheath. No going back now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: She- she sliced through the outpost wall?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that operator hadn't told us to look out for her 'sword,' I never would have called that a 'sword.'
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Come on, I gave you a three day break and this is the best you can do?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Li'l Lava got me all pumped for you guys. What the hell?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No more tricks today?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You're out here all alone. Don't think you'll have it so easy.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I'm more than a match for you all by my sweet little lonesome...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ooh no. I think here is where I say 'I won't soil my own hands here. You're not worth my time.'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Thanks for the reminder. That's how this was supposed to go!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, we're surrounded!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's a lot of them, but they go down easy.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: How——
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ah, right, forgot to mention.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The past three days, with nothing else to do, I've been polishing up these 'Reunion' things.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You know, the real ones weren't so different. They were expendable to you, same as my Tinmen.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm not sure what the whole deal is with this Oripathy thingy, but I guess it explains why forging these things feels so weird.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It makes a difference.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en! Look out!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Pfft!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: No way.... Did those illusions just use Arts?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If I felt like it, I could melt down that whole district and turn it into a giant Tinman. But do I feel like it? Hmm...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nah, that sounds like a pain in the ass.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But it's not that hard to make a few Infected puppets. It's just one more process.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You..... That's not something you can joke about....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Treating the Infected like that... is too cruel!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Like what? Look, I really don't care who's Infected or whatever. Do you guys think that much about Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Fire!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Hm. That was kind of a wimpy bolt.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Here's what I'm going to do: I'm gonna walk forward, one step at a time, right up to your base, and destroy it.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And you can try to stop me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Snowsant.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Aaaahhh! Sorry! I didn't mean to...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Wait, what did I do....?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Y- you're from Rhodes Island, aren't you?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Operator Lava.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I need a blueprint of the infrastructure district. The underground part.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Uh, that's classified by the engineering department, and the procedures are complicated.... What do you need it for?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I'm making one hell of a firecracker.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: F- firecracker?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I'm putting every second of progress we've made since the dawn of time up against the Nian.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: N-N-N-N-Nian——? Is it really a g-giant? You need explosives? Orrrr... the city's defensive cannons?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No. Before we start talking about the firing angle on those bulky things.... You can't fire a huge cannon at your own city....
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...No, wait.... The cannons....
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: The defensive cannons....
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Lava?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Those cannons... they're pretty much like a two-step firecracker, aren't they?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: No! They literally couldn't be more different!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: They're both based on an industrial Originium process.... they both explode.... in mid-air....
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's a two-step firecracker!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Why does it have to be a two-step?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: So maybe.... But it would cause some damage to the main city....?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: L- Lava? What you're muttering there is kind of the understatement of the century, but you're not really thinking that, are you?
attributes.name: Snowsant..

attributes.content: ——It's fine. I'll take care of it. Trust me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Th- then I'll go submit the application...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: That will take too long. I will add a supplementary report later.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: We can't let these regulations slow us down when we're fighting for our lives.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: B- but it takes time to sort out the documents from each department and print them out...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Ah, I know!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: I can draw a simple diagram for you.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hold on, I need to find something to draw with...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: ...Chief Wei, is Lungmen's superstructure really that simple?
attributes.name: Lava..

attributes.content: It's very complicated, of course. The power supply to the surface plane alone, not to mention the Originium engine is a tremendous undertaking.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: But if Snowsant thinks she can draw it, perhaps she can.
attributes.name: Wei Fumizuki

attributes.content: I wanted to study up for my new job, so I went ahead and memorized every blueprint I could find!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: D- don't worry! It's just about memorizing something and drawing it out. Even I can handle that!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: ...That's all, huh?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: So many Reunion.... There's no end to them....
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You go on ahead and take up a position at the next intersection.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: At least pin down those Terracottas.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: What about me, huh? Isn't anyone going to pin me down?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: All I had to do was ask? Now that's what I call service.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (There's something not quite right about her shield——)
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I'm coming, Officer Ch'en——!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey now, you've got a fine looking weapon at your side there. But instead you're using that hunk of junk? I'm kind of offended.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And you, little one, you seem to have some power you can't quite control. Why don't you put on a show for me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't let her get to you!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I won't!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What gives? Why is everyone acting all cool these days? Don't tell me modern human society is all about repressing your feelings?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's no fun fighting people who can't use their full power. You keep looking at my sword and shield? Go on. Take your best shot.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ——Don't mind if I do!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: ——! You broke her shield!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you did! Congrats.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, would you look at that. Got a new one.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Pfft. I knew it...
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Ch'en Sir, the enemy is hitting our defensive line, we can't hold on much longer!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Withdraw the L.G.D., close the gate, and activate the defenses.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Stall for as long as possible.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I hope Lava has a plan.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What the hell, you're running away already?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Looks like we're almost to the end of the line here... is it that building?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's big.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who needs a building that tall anyway?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm back. Is the evacuation complete?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Other departments already left L.G.D. HQ and our teams have surrounded the area as planned.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Don't let anything through our net. I want minimal casualties.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I'm sorry, where's Lava?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Operator Lava left after obtaining a structural diagram from Snowsant...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We have to trust her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You mean we have no choice but to trust her.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: The Nian broke through the perimeter! The gate has been breached!
attributes.name: Serious L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Is the surveillance system still working? Track her movements!
attributes.name: Frivolous L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Don't get into a firefight. It'll only end poorly for us.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Lava was right. We can't fight the Nian until we know her true form, and her true power——
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And how to defeat her once and for all.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Lava!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope you've found a solution.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: We have to blow the core of the city's defensive cannons. I'll lead her there.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And how are you going to do that? It's not like you can just ask her.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I see you've gotten a taste of her sparkling personality.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Anyway, you let me worry about that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Nobody home? Weird.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Did I bump up the difficulty too quick? I should've known they were too weak.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Movement? Where?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ooh! I was worried I hit you too hard last time. It's such a relief to see you alive and kicking, li'l Lava.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: To gather up all that power in your staff and blow open such a big hole with a little tap on the ground——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're pretty strong, compared to what I've been seeing.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...This is city's core district.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I know, I've been brushing up on modern technology these last three days. Intercity networks are such a handy invention. It would be nice to have them out over the whole continent someday.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You really learn fast.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Aww, I'm average at best.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: After all, I'm on kind of a tight schedule every time I wake up.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Your brothers and sisters are that impatient?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I was thinking about it, after last time. There's no way you had such detailed information. You were playing me, weren't you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Gold star for figuring that one out.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What about your sister? Where is she again?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How did you——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ——that's none of your business.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ooh, I see how it is.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I envy you two. You don't have to kill each other just to remember your faces.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A flowery flame. You mad?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Did you just say 'kill each other?'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You couldn't have...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Twelve.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Twelve, including me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I've been fighting my eleven brothers and sisters for a length of time your tiny mind couldn't possibly comprehend.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's really pretty dumb. What happens when your right hand fights your left? What changes when you steal from yourself?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's completely pointless.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I guess you don't get along with your siblings.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Are you trying to play me again?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: That's the first time you've attacked without some pithy one-liner.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But don't think that's going to work out for you.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Mmm! What are you doing...? Are you trying to tear this place down?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Gah.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I can't beat you in battle. I know that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: 'But...?' Where's the 'but?'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What a pain in the ass. It's so dark. Why don't I just make us a huge battering ram and call it a day.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I would advise against that.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Why——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wait, what's this? This core? It's a forge.... No, it's a weapon? A siege weapon?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This heat.... Did you build this?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Looks like you didn't learn everything when brushing up on modern tech. Still, I think you should already understand how this thing works.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I made you a giant city defense cannon firecracker. Want to set it off?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: This isn't enough to scare me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ——How about now?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You....
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're a special girl, li'l Lava. Look at you compressing the space around the explosion.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're not getting away as long as I'm standing.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Even if you did manage to contain the blast to the spatial area around you, we'd both be blown clear.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's the Originium drive core of this cannon, and there's me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Huh. You're going to use Arts after getting blown up into the sky? Like a big two-step firecracker?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You're playing it cool, but you're scared, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What about you? You can't use Arts and protect yourself from the explosion at the same time.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You've built yourself a tomb. You're going to die.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Not necessarily.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: But I definitely won't.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Putting a scratch on you is worth it.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Bold. Bold... Props for that one.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Now it's my turn to ask questions. What do you actually want out of this?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: We've been killing each other since long before the time that this body's consciousness can recall.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then about as far back as I can remember, we started to grow tired of our endless conflict.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And that's why you started attacking cities?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Everyone who walks this world today is a survivor. That's how life carries on.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't think I'll let you go just because you tell me some sob story.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hmph... My story's not really that tragic.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm not sure when, but we eventually learned some interesting games from the humans. We ended up playing those instead of fighting.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Like rock, paper, scissors and stuff.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Agh! Dammit! You're really gonna kill yourself just to take me down with you?!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You said you definitely wouldn't die.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hmph. It's only a turn of phrase.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...According to my calculations, you're running out of time.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's worth the risk.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, is it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Let's count down 'three, two, one' and then blow the place together?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Three——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Explosion confirmed! Defensive cannon auxiliary core #2 is not responding!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Do you see Lava?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. There's too much smoke from the explosion, we——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Wait! There's movement. Something's coming out of the smoke!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ahahaha, you actually did it! It's been so long since I've seen an explosion like that! Reminds me of that dirty little brat harassing me every day!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ugh——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: L- let go!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ugh. You dropped me!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You told me to.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Located Rhodes Island operator Lava and the target!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Surround them.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: What was that...? Why did you save me?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I hate that sound. And I also accidentally saved you when you jumped on me... Whew, you're lucky to be alive. And you're still looking for a melee?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This really took a lot out of me. Wow. My hands are numb.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Well, I can't fight anymore. Do it already.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Make it quick.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You....
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Come on, I'm laying here flat on my back, waiting for you to kill me. What do you need? An engraved invitation?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: (Why would she suddenly surrender so easily...?)
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...Whatever trick you're trying to pull, I'm not falling for it.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Killing you isn't the answer. I'll take you back to Rhodes Island for interrogation.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Nah.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You have to kill me, now. Or have one of those guys do it. That's what they wanted to do anyway, right?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Fire!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Ah, sweet relief at last...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You said you wanted to know the truth, li'l Lava. So listen up. The reason I attacked the city is——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Lungmen's...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hot peppers... aren't... spicy... enough...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't get it? That sucks.... Goodbye....
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nice... knowing you...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Be careful, she may still have some tricks up her sleeve.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. She doesn't.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Shit——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: We've been played.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Her body... it's... gone?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: She created an illusion of herself with the tremendous heat of the blast, and we——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Let her get away.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: After all that effort, all that sacrifice, we let her get away!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Well, yeah. But it would be super lame if I just ran off, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I suddenly came up with a way better idea. Do you remember when I talked about making a big monster out of the whole city?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: W- what?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The city... it's rising... what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You really think I was just hanging out there all that time? Of course I had to make myself a satisfying monster.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: By the way, li'l Lava, you needed me to save your life in our little kerfuffle back there? You're not gonna make it through this one. Not by a longshot.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'll have you try to kill my monster. Just maybe you humans have the power to contain its madness these days.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ah, let's call it the Dark Devastator, a monster crafted with the matter and heat of an entire city. That's sexy enough to satisfy.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: If you guys can't handle a fella like this, well... Sooner or later, someone else would've come along and done you in. My brothers and sisters aren't really the merciful type.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Too bad, li'l Lava.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We might not get to eat hot pot together.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'Zhendang Kongling, Bayin Siqi——'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wait, wait wait! Don't just start with the mystical incantations in weird languages! That's not how this goes!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How am I supposed to wrap this up?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What? I'm the main villain. The audience expects me to do something awesome.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Not like this!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...I'm begging you. Were you ad libbing those lines back there? They didn't make any sense.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I can't follow this at all. What happened to the zombie horde attacking Lungmen?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Trust me. I watch like a hundred Columbian B-movies a year. They make bank.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But this is already way too messed up... Is this your one-woman show? All you're doing is monologuing. Where's everybody else?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Who cares? I'm the main character, aren't I?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I thought I was the main character? And the director, for that matter?!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Hey, li'l Lava, we're friends, aren't we? You're talking like you being the director means you get to boss me around.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No, no, that's not what I meant——
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ——And a two-step firecracker? Is there a reason it has to be a two-step?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I really hate the sound of firecrackers. They bring back nasty memories.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Like yesterday when Spot spooked me with one and I spilled soda on myself.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And what's with this giant monster at the end? How are we supposed to afford that?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: It's wicked cool.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's. Not. Cool!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Tsk, tsk, tsk, li'l Lava, think about it. What kind of movie are we making here?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Huge monsters, stripped of the constraints of modern society, reveling in their savagery——It's that call of the wild that city folk today are missing!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: By the way, the actors you picked suck. They're all so stiff.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We should've gone with these ones... Here, check this file, what's her name? Blaze? And this one, Emperor?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hey! This FEater is a movie star! What's with you just picking a bunch of Lungmenite nobodies? Some kind of avant-garde realism?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hold on, now that I look at these, there's some classified records in here...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You can't ever let my sis——you can't ever let that doctor know! Or we're done for!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Why are you so afraid of her? All right, all right. Let's just change up the ending a bit...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We're running out of time, and you're still obsessed with cultivating humans? Cultivating humans who can stop us?
...Wait. Nian, what are you doing?
Your breath is quickening, your consciousness is shaking... What do you see?
...Strange, did they actually make it...?
Huh? You're asking me?
How should I know? I went to Yan a long, long time ago and spread a fun little rumor along the way.
What, a few humans know your weakness and you can't fight anymore? Who put that thought in your head?
Huh? A two-step firecracker? You got killed by a firecracker?
Hahahahaha! Hey! I wish I could have been there. I'd have memorialized your defeat with the most perfect strokes——
I'm glad you finally got to eat crow.
...Lungmen.
I love this city. It has such chaotic struggles in it that just leap off the page. The perfect hunting ground.
Ahh, but it's not your turn.
I'm so tired of this cycle of sleeping and waking.
It's time to quench the fires of this world.
——ANCIENT FORGE 2——
——COMING SOON——
Wait wait wait!!!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: What is it this time?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Who's that? Why do they want to eat people? Why the hell is there a sequel?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: You don't think giant monsters that eat people and fight weak humans will sell?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: W- well, maybe...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: All you need is words like 'fire', 'slaughter', 'cycle', and a little bitterness, a little darker lighting, a little more camera shake, a little more blood, and you've got a picture!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's called spectacle. We're creating the most profitable entertainment product in all of Terra right here!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nope, that wasn't the deal. We agreed we're making a New Year's movie.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And that's your sister, isn't it?! I can't believe you're making a spectacle of your own little sister!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: She deserves it. She put ice cream in my hot pot and dumped all my chili sauce.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I really don't get what you two got going on.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Glass houses. What's the deal with you and your sister? Do you like, like her or do you hate her or what?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Agh!!! We're not talking about this! I'm going back to fix all my lines!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: And hurry up and put those files back before Amiya finds out! Where did you get them anyway?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I snuck a peek a while back and recorded them. My powers come in handy like that.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Really listen to me this time, or else you'll end up.... I don't even want to think about how you'll end up.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Seriously! Make sure you put them back!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: All right. Take your time. I can't wait to see your new script, director!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sigh.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What's the big deal? Everybody's so worked up about it.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'Don't allow standard operators to view classified records.'
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I guess my impression could use some work. But copying a classified record is kind of going a bit too far.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So it's a secret, huh? That explains why the content is so juicy.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Life is short. Why get caught up in all that?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Li'l Lava put so much into writing out her idea of Lungmen. What do you think? Isn't it cooler to turn the whole city into a metal monster and go all CLANG——BAM——POW! Hmm?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You better work it out with your director. But if you do turn a city into a giant robot, you be sure to let me enjoy it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's a little creative license. Otherwise I'd be out doing that right now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Li'l Lava's a gentle soul, I get it. But you gotta go big or go home, you know? Even if the going gets tough.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Well, now that I'm on board, maybe we'll shake up the Columbian studios?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ummm.... Hmmm.... How do I say this....?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: There's way too much exposition in the script? And it's full of B-movie garbage?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, the director is fine with it. Not to mention you're the only one who knows which parts are real and which parts are fake.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Huh? Which ones are fake?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A story naturally changes form over time, as it gets passed down.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The scarier and more unrealistic a story is, the more people are interested. Pretty much the same as a movie.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Story, huh...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: A script is pretty much a 'story' anyway, so I think li'l Lava can figure it out.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's how your people are. Mysterious and elusive. Those other ones were too.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Before Dr. Kal'tsit let it slip, I never knew she was here. I should have asked for an autograph... Ugh....
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ahh.... You mean the ones on the beach? With the band?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I thought your race didn't care for each other.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: This is slander! Who said that?! I'll sue!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The one and only, huh...? Never mind.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Li'l Lava and I love their music! Our top ten album lists are a little different though.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But I've known what they are ever since I first saw them, first heard their melodies. Not bad, living free and easy. Better than the ones under the sea——
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Yeah, but how did you know she was at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I can tell the surveillance system was pretty brutally hacked.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ha, ha, ha, me? I'm not gonna tinker with that stuff just because I'm curious about new technology! Definitely not! Not this Nian!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hey! That was hard to fix! There's better ways for you to pull records!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If you were a good girl who worked hard, you could've gotten some Yan food in the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I am working hard! I'll lend you 'Lungmen Doomwatch' for a little historical research, and the real issue with it is...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Is what?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doesn't the title kinda suck? What's a 'Doomwatch?'
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I noticed the operators have been registering their equipment with more Laterano-ey names lately. Turns out that's your fault?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How about 'Ancient Forge'!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Do you think you could get these guys to come work with us on our movie? That's all I really care about.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No way, the actors you guys picked are too much.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Put a little more effort into it! It's a Rhodes Island New Year's movie!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Throw those guys in there and there's no room for effort! Get real!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Pfft. Fine! As a true cinephile, I will express my motivations to the audience through the medium of film! I'm sure I'll get through!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, do you think I should add 'based on true events'? Is that too scary? Would it freak out li'l Lava?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Lava's not a kid anymore. We can all see how much she's grown.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...A kid? You're about the same age, aren't you? Sarkaz don't show their age so well, but you can't fool me.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ahem! She's the backbone of Rhodes Island! An operator anyone can rely on!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Yeah, right.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: It's just like she always dreamed. She's doing some badass stuff, becoming a badass warrior.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How about that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So what's to worry about? Where's the harm in a little more knowledge?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm not here to play mystic like some people. Just come out and say whatever you gotta say.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Besides, they'll find out sooner or later. I've got a plan.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Ugh.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: They'll find out sooner or later... hey! You've got a point there!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: But why start with Lava?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I really like my li'l Lava.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Her hard work, her attitude, her progress, Rhodes Island always surprises me like that.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You got the scrappy little one making big strides. That's more fun than the operators who are already too strong for their own good, right?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So I'm willing to stay here and sell Rhodes Island to my brothers and sisters who aren't so hostile to humans.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...How do you sell it? The best mobile ship on Terra for mingling?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That's right! Rhodes Island's infinite inclusiveness is the key to settling any clash of tastes!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Not to mention, it's one of the few places out there you can still have a little fun.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We can get along, we can fight, and we can watch the sunset together after a hangover.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Every tomorrow is pretty precarious for me. You know.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So I really kinda like Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh... well... hm...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Am I supposed to blush and accept the compliment? Or should I just tease you for being super sappy?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Happy New Year! What's for dinner?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Lava?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: About principal photography on the New Year's film...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Give me a little time. Thanks to a certain hammy lead actress, we might not be able to make it.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Huh? What did she do...?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ugh.... Have you seen this new script....?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: ...So what do we do?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Whatever. Just improvise.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Honestly, I knew what you were going for. I knew what you were trying to show me.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: If you're trying to send a message, you don't screw around with it...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: 'Lungmen's hot peppers aren't spicy enough.'
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Not changing up this stupid death scene at all, huh.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Heh, what a lousy villain.
attributes.name: Lava
